title: Metadata
description: Requires metadata fields and terms determined by the USFWS Alaska Region DST for Projects.

errorMessage.required: At least one contact must be provided in the 'Metadata Contact' section under the 'Metadata' tab. At least one role must be 'pointOfContact'.

role.errorMessage: At least one person must be provided with the role 'pointOfContact' under the 'Metadata Contacts' section of the 'Metadata' tab.

required.status: Project status must be provided in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Main' tab. Status should be one of: 'completed', 'onGoing', 'proposed', or 'accepted'
required.pointOfContact: Project personnel must be provided in the 'Point of Contact' section under the 'Main' tab.
required.timePeriod: Project time period must be provided in the 'Time Period' section under the 'Main' tab. At least a project start date and/or a project end date should be provided.

errorMessage.enum: Project status in the 'Basic Information' section under the 'Main' tab must be one of: 'completed', 'onGoing', 'proposed', or 'accepted'

role.errorMessage: The 'Point of Contact' section under the 'Main' tab must have at least one person listed as the role 'pointOfContact'.

errorMessage.contains: The 'Point of Contact' section under the 'Main' tab must have at least one person listed as the role 'pointOfContact'.

role.errorMessage: One role for 'Responsible Parties' within the 'Citation' section under the 'Main' tab must be pointOfContact.

required.date: At least one date (e.g. acquisition, creation, revision) must be provided in the 'Citation' section under the 'Main' tab.
required.responsibleParty: At least one Responsible Party must be provided in the 'Citation' section under the 'Main' tab. At least one role must be listed a pointOfContact.
required.onlineResource: At least one onlineResource should be provided within the 'Citation' section under the 'Main' tab. A link to the project Regional Data Repository folder can be used if no other online resource exists yet.
